Matrix.RommId: go to room settings -> advanced to find the internal room id
Matrix.AccessToken: log into the account, goto settings -> Help & about -> click to reveal (do not log out of the account or the token is revoked)

Slack.Webhook: Create a slack app to get your incoming webhook url: https://api.slack.com/messaging/webhooks

SendGrid.Key: Generate an api key with Mail.send permissions in the portal
SendGrid.Sender: The email of the originating domain (token must be valid for it)
